snippet: Tom Raybould, who wrote the music for the film “The Machine,” contends that a producer and writer associated with the Weeknd acknowledged sampling the score.
abstract: Copyright infringement suit is filed in Los Angeles on behalf of Welsh composer Tom Raybould against The Weeknd for his song The Hills.
lead_paragraph: Tom Raybould, who wrote the music for the film “The Machine,” contends that a producer and writer associated with the Weeknd acknowledged sampling the score.

headline.main: Suit Claims Weeknd Song Infringes on Copyright of Film Soundtrack
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Copyright Lawsuit Is Filed Against the Weeknd
